text:
- My name is Rajesh Tammana,
I manage the engineering
of a product called Audit Manager.
And what Audit Manager does
is it automates the compliance collection

and the compliance
reporting for customers.

I've been with AWS for about
a year and I'm loving it.
What I love about AWS is the scope,

the opportunity to solve
complex customer problems.
At AWS, I train my team as well,

we follow agile methodologies
and every employee,
every team member is given ownership

and they have the
autonomy to make decisions
and risk is encouraged.

So we encourage people
to identify problems
and come up with solutions.
We reward people taking challenges.
We reward people taking risks.

Anyone who is looking
for a great team culture,

a work-life balance, opportunity
to solve complex problems,
AWS Audit Manager is a great team.
(gentle upbeat music)
